sentence.Network_en: You didn't just schlep your guitar around from folk club to folk club.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不只是背着吉他艰难地从一家乡村俱乐部转到另一家。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... schlemiel 倒楣的人 schlep 搬运 schlepp 傻瓜.
美国英语 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... lox 熏鲑鱼 schlep 费劲携带 schmuck 笨蛋、蠢货.
美国英语与英国英语的区别_爱问知识人 ... lox 熏鲑鱼 schlep 携带 schmuck 笨人.

list.abs: so it may be a bit of a schlep ., 所以会有些远.

if you work for a big multinational company in Beijing , you are doing government relations , you are schlepping guanxi ( the Chinese word for connections ) ; in Shanghai you are schlepping product .如果你在北京为一家大型跨国公司工作，那你做的主要是政府公关，是在拉关系；而在上海，你是在做产品。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent. (as a verb): from Yiddish shlepn 'drag', from Middle High German sleppen

entry.tran: (费力或不方便地)携带,搬运，拖曳
entry.def: If you schlep something somewhere, you take it there although this is difficult or inconvenient.

example.ex: You didn't just schlep your guitar around from folk club to folk club.
example.tran: 你不只是背着吉他艰难地从一家乡村俱乐部转到另一家。

entry.def: If you schlep somewhere, you go there.

example.ex: It's too cold to schlepp around looking at property.
example.tran: 天太冷，不适合到处去看房子。

entry.tran: 蠢货;笨蛋;笨手笨脚的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a schlep, you mean that they are stupid or clumsy.

means.word_mean: 1. pull along heavily, like a heavy load against a resistance;

sentences.sentence: "Can you shlep this bag of potatoes upstairs?"

auth_sentence.content: But a schlep and a weeper is a hero impossible to stay interested in.
auth_sentence.res_content: But a schlep and a weeper is a hero impossible to stay interested in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But a schlep and a weeper is a hero impossible to stay interested in.
